function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor waste management of home quarantine waste","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread through contaminated waste","Mitigation":"Separate and sanitize waste to prevent contamination","Technologies":"Sanitization technologies for waste management","People":"Patients under home quarantine, waste management services","Owner":"Waste management services, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Suspension of recycling practices during a pandemic","Impact":"Increased accumulation of recyclable waste and limited waste management options","Mitigation":"Implement alternative waste management strategies for recyclable materials","Technologies":"Innovative recycling and waste separation technologies","People":"General population, waste management services","Owner":"Waste management services, government authorities"},{"Description":"Increased water consumption and lack of sustainable water use during pandemics","Impact":"Risk of water scarcity and unsustainable water consumption","Mitigation":"Promote sustainable water usage practices, invest in efficient water technologies","Technologies":"Smart water meters, efficient water fixtures, water recycling systems","People":"Households, general population","Owner":"Government authorities, water management organizations"}]}
